name: AI Playground
title: BioImage Archive AI Playground
subtitle: Explore how AI models perform on different datasets
body_text: This is a collection of models from the BioImage Model zoo that have been applied to datasets from the BioImage Archive. You can explore the outputs of several models on a dataset to get an idea of what is the most suitable model for a specific image. Or you can investigate how a model works on different datasets and see how widely-applicable the model is.
